This blog contains most of my own art/graphics/edits. Email: astairewashere@gmail.com (or you can hit me up by messaging me here) Links: plu.us/shahs Paypal: paypal.me/SharonWongYin

tags: all you had to do was stay
summary: For @michaelathewordsmith...based on the songs “How you get the Girl”, “This Love”, “All you had to do was stay”, and “Bad...
caption:
For @michaelathewordsmith…based on the songs “How you get the Girl”, “This Love”, “All you had to do was stay”, and “Bad Blood”…enjoy!

You growled from your bindings. It had been at least an hour since you were dragged into this room. The First Order had caught you while you were attempting to help some civilians leave the chaotic area. The only reason you were caught was because you had fought them off until everyone was safely on their way down a tunnel.

Despite your current state, your brain went to the man you thought you knew. The man who had been your best friend, then your lover, and then your betrayer.

As if being cued in, the door hissed, revealing the dark figure that was Kylo Ren.

He hadn’t been Ben Solo in a long time.

Stand there like a ghost
Shaking come the rain, rain
She’ll open up the door
And say, are you insane (How you get the Girl)

You bared your teeth to him like a rabid animal. All the hatred coursed through your veins like magma. Memories of destruction and regret filled your psyche and you were sure the masked devil was seeing what you were.

“I see your disposition hasn’t changed,” he muttered, a filtered voice reaching your ears.
“Why should it? You’re the same monster who left me and destroyed those innocent children.”
“They were Jedi-”
“INNOCENT CHILDREN,” you snarled.

People like you always want back the love they gave away
And people like me wanna believe you when you say you’ve changed
The more I think about it now the less I know
All I know is that you drove us off the road (All you had to do was Stay)

Kylo Ren studied you from under his mask. He’d be lying to himself if he said he didn’t have any feelings for you. You were his first and only love. The fact that you didn’t join him that night was a freezing of his nearly torn heart.

He couldn’t blame you though. He knew your allegiance before he felt the call to the Dark Side. If you were one thing, you were loyal to your beliefs.

You had felt the air around you two thicken with millions of emotions. Anger. Fear. Regret. Missed love. Missed chances. Missed futures. Kylo Ren slumped his shoulders and hung his head.

“Whether or not you believe it, I don’t want to hurt you Y/N.”
“You’re makin’ that real clear, aren’t ya?” you bit at him, “Hiding behind a mask!”

You couldn’t help the anger seething out of you. Part of you was tired with the anger you constantly held toward the man. But…he made his decision long ago.

It seemed he was tired of fighting as well. Slowly, he removed his helmet. In an odd way, this lessened his foreboding stature. You could see the genuine pain crossing his features.

“Please, don’t make me hurt you,” he whispered.

This love is good
This love is bad
This love is a life back from the dead, oh
These hands had to let it go free
And this love came back to me, oh (This Love)

You jerked your head to side, avoiding eye contact.

“You have a choice,” you mumbled back, “You don’t have to hurt me.”
“I can’t let you go,” he reminded you.
Gritting your teeth, you fixed your steely gaze on his. “I won’t give you anything.”
He momentarily bit his lower lip. “…I’m afraid you will.”

Now we got problems
And I don’t think we can solve them
You made a really deep cut
And baby now we got bad blood (Bad Blood)

“Then, goodbye.”

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @ttelesilla @jumperswellies @caitsymichelle13 @frostbyte-horan @bestillmystuckyheart​ @littlestfangirl​ @anali-022506​ @krylo-rxn​ @ilovetvshowsblog​ @yllwtaxi @mimikyu-of-death
Semi-tags: @bi-shy-and-ready-to-die

blog.description: Hi Minnie here! 19/bisexual/British/cis-female. Most of this blog will be TMNT, EAH, Marvel, DC, VLD, Disney, Dreamworks, ATLA/TLOK, Star Wars and many other things. I have wrote some fanfictions and drawn some fan art if you want to check that out. Find me on: http://archiveofourown.org/users/MinnieTheMoocherDA/pseuds/MinnieTheMoocherDA https://www.fanfiction.net/u/6199903/MinnieTheMoocherDA

question: Finn/Rose
answer:
vomit / don’t ship / okay / cute / adorable / perfect / beyond flawless / hot damn / screaming and crying / i will ship them in hell 

I don’t really have anything against this pairing, it’s more because I’d prefer Finn to be with either Poe or Rey. I really liked Rose as a character in TLJ I just felt that both her and Finn were really underused. And I felt like their kiss came kind of out of nowhere and felt really one sided on Rose’s part. Like I said I don’t really have anything against the pairing and I understand why people ship them and I wouldn’t be angry or anything if they were a couple in Episode IX, it’s mainly that I ship Finn with other people and I don’t think TLJ treated their characters that well.

Thank you so much for asking!

blog.name: lost-inthesunlight
blog.description: find me as Avdal on AO3 and fanfiction.net! <3

summary: Another (not so) speed paint, this time I tried a hybrid of based off a reference and then freestyle.  Kylo looks a little weird...
caption:
Another (not so) speed paint, this time I tried a hybrid of based off a reference and then freestyle.  Kylo looks a little weird here (as we all know he’s got a very special face and the ref. model really didn’t look much like him).  His gloves were an epic pain to try and make look even semi decent but it was important for the scene because this is definitely a Kylo not Ben moment, lol


link to my other artwork can be found HERE

title: Droid chatter
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LmIE0d

by Munnin

L3 and R2 catch up after not seeing each other for years.

Just a bit of silly fun.

Words: 333, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 44 of The Star Wars Write Stuff challenge.

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

summary: How can a writer | artist  give up on his work so easily? For example: Masashi Kishimoto or George Lucas. I mean, why? You put...
body: How can a writer | artist  give up on his work so easily? For example: Masashi Kishimoto or George Lucas. I mean, why? You put your time, your life time, your free time in this work, you love characters, which you created and you give up on them so easily? I just can not accept this kind of writers and artists.

reblog.comment: How can a writer | artist  give up on his work so easily? For example: Masashi Kishimoto or George Lucas. I mean, why? You put your time, your life time, your free time in this work, you love characters, which you created and you give up on them so easily? I just can not accept this kind of writers and artists.

trail.content_raw: How can a writer | artist  give up on his work so easily? For example: Masashi Kishimoto or George Lucas. I mean, why? You put your time, your life time, your free time in this work, you love characters, which you created and you give up on them so easily? I just can not accept this kind of writers and artists.
trail.content: How can a writer | artist  give up on his work so easily? For example: Masashi Kishimoto or George Lucas. I mean, why? You put your time, your life time, your free time in this work, you love characters, which you created and you give up on them so easily? I just can not accept this kind of writers and artists.
